alert.note: Alert for Southern San Luis Valley; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Costilla and east central Conejos Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Costilla, or 19 miles north of Questa, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Luis, Mesita, San Acacio, San Pablo, Sanchez Reservoir, Chama and Garcia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern San Luis Valley; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
